info.name: apartment-finder
info.description:
apartment-finder setup and workflow collection
Use with matching apartment-finder environment export

When setting up for the first time, run in this order:
- everything in tpaga folder UP TO "Create merchant bridge", inclusive
- everything in giros folder UP TO "Get merchant access token", inclusive
